description: 54gene is a digital health and drug discovery platform that seeks to leverage under-represented African genomic data in research.
99 Minutos is a last-mile logistics company that reliably delivers products from enterprise e-commerce clients to the customer’s doorstep in as little as 99 minutes at low cost.

Abarca Health is a pharmacy benefits manager (PBM) that partners with health plans, employers, and government programs to manage drug costs and optimize the pharmacy and overall healthcare experience.

AcreTrader democratizes the process of selling and investing in farmland. The company is an investing and trading platform that allows accredited investors to purchase shares of U.S. farmland in just minutes online.
ADDI provides underserved consumers with simple, affordable and transparent loans at the point-of-sale.
AeroSafe Global provides end-to-end cold chain logistics solutions to the biopharmaceutical industry.

Alictus is a developer and self-publisher of mobile games, focusing on the hypercasual genre and has released top-charting and long-lasting products such as Collect Cubes, Art Ball 3D, Spear.io, and Boas.io.
Altruist is a digital investment platform that puts powerful software and free trading into the hands of good financial advisors to automatically reduce taxes, fees, and risk.
AnyMind Group is removing barriers and granting global brands direct access to Southeast Asia, Greater China, India and the Middle East’s massive consumer base.
AppHarvest builds and operates greenhouses across the US.
Aruna is an online fishery marketplace that enables fisheries to trade easily and transparently throughout Indonesia.

ASTI Mobile Robotics designs, manufactures, implements, and maintains driverless vehicle systems (AGVs – automated guided vehicles) used to move materials and products from place to place in factories and warehouses. The company was acquired by ABB in July 2021.
Athena is one of the pioneers and top mobile casual game companies in the ad-based model worldwide.
Auth0 is an identity and authentication platform designed to verify users and tackle identity fraud. The company was acquired for $6.5B by Okta in 2021.
Beep Saúde is Brazil’s premier digital vaccination-on-demand platform.
Bending Spoons is a mobile app development company that has built several of the most downloaded apps worldwide.

Betterfly is a Chilean insurtech and corporate wellness platform that rewards employees for healthy lifestyle habits with life insurance coverage, as well as a platform to donate to high-impact causes.
BillGO’s award-winning real-time bill management & payments platform transforms the dreaded necessity of managing & paying bills into an opportunity for financial well-being.
Bitso is a digital crypto currency exchange in Latin America.
Bloomscape is a direct-to-consumer plant brand, offering a contemporary e-commerce shopping experience tailored to customers.
